definitions.definition: The action or motion of something that curls or is curled.
examples: a scornful curling of the lip

definitions.definition: A winter sport where players aim and slide stones down a sheet of ice and attempt to get their color stones closest to the house (a circular target marked on the ice).

main_definition: The action or motion of something that curls or is curled.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A winter sport where players aim and slide stones down a sheet of ice and attempt to get their color stones closest to the house (a circular target marked on the ice).
